tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBG Missing) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN boyfriend)) (, ,) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN family)) (, ,) (CC and) (NP (NNS friends))) (NP-TMP (RB really) (JJ bad) (NN tonight))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Missing/VBG dobj>[boyfriend/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ punct>,/, conj:and>[family/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$] punct>,/, cc>and/CC conj:and>friends/NNS] dobj>family/NN dobj>friends/NNS nmod:tmod>[tonight/NN advmod>really/RB amod>bad/JJ] punct>./.]
